info.brief_description: A character gains the power to possess bodies, they test their new power on the WWE divas.
info.description:
I'm trying to reboot this old story to get it active again, this story will receive an added on storyline involving a WWE superstar obtaining the power of body possession. This story need some help from you to make this a good long possession story, so help out by adding to it! Not a member? Well become one and add! And take a look at some of my other stories and add to them too!


-Lonedynasty


OC Storyline:

You are Alex, a WWE fan in high school, and thanks to a magic spell from a spell book you find in a old box in your house.With this power in Alex's hands he uses it to possess the divas of the WWE who are in to town to do photo shot in your town of L.A!

Alex is the only one in this story with this power! Also when he possess a girl he haves full control of his feelings and the body he is in, like he would if he was in his own body and still acts like himself no matter what body he is in.This means when he takes over a girl he does not act like the girl he is possessing. Alex is the only one who have this power and there can not be other people who have this power. Keep all this in mind!

WWE Superstar storyline:

In this storyline a WWE superstar of your choosing has might a fate in which his has been place in a coma and now founds them self in spirt form with the power to possess people at will. This Superstar will use this power for their own personal gain or fun.





Rules and Facts:

No random killing
Sex is ok
No ending the story

Help out and add to this story!
Anyone is free to Email me about the story!
Try and add full chapters to make this story better!

Have fun!

And once again have fun viewing and adding to the story!
